• ONLINE-CSR™ Services will lower costs by verifying and adjusting all rates, and services where possible.  We will create an inventory of all of your Telecom services, confirm the accuracy of each billing and efficiency of all services. 
 
  • The service providers generally will not aid their customers in the renegotiations of contracts, reconfiguration of services, or billing analysis. ONLINE-CSR™ assumes this role for our clients.
 
  • ONLINE-CSR™ plays the role of an objective third party in reviewing billing and service rates. A customer's awareness of options should not be limited due to their dependence on the service providers for explanations of policies, procedures, and the technological environment that directly affect the customer's monthly recurring charges.
